      • validateTargetPlayer

        public boolean validateTargetPlayer​(Player attacker,
                                    Player target)
        Checks whether a player can be targeted
        Parameters:
        attacker - The player who is attacking
        target - The designed player target
        Returns:
        True if the target can be hit, false otherwise

      • compatibleTargetPlayers

        public boolean compatibleTargetPlayers​(Player attacker,
                                       java.util.List<Player> targets)
        Checks whether a group of players can be targeted by an attack
        Parameters:
        attacker - The player who is attacking
        targets - The List of designed targets
        Returns:
        True if it's a legal target list, false otherwise
